title: Spacious First floor unit !
posting_body: New to the neighborhood is the 2.4 mile Rock Island Road Bike and Pedestrian Trail located directly across the street!
Spacious 2 bedroom floorplans come with wood-style plank flooring*, black cabinets, black appliances*, and two-tone paint.
Full size washer/dryer hook-ups are in every home and the closet space is something dreams are made of.
A refreshing pool (open seasonally) and picnic areas are available for your enjoyment, and there is plenty of parking throughout the community.
Make your appointment today and come see your new home!
Professionally Managed by Cirrus Asset Management, Inc., TX - License # 9003183
